bdi4jade.util.goal

Class SequentialGoal

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.util.goal.CompositeGoal
      • bdi4jade.util.goal.SequentialGoal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Goal, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable

    public class SequentialGoal
extends CompositeGoal
    This class represents a goal that aims at achieving all goals that compose this goal in a sequential way.
    Author:
    ingrid
